channel.title: Please read...BIG problem ruining our server!
channel.description: Guys i have this problem where any item that is dropped and picked up, when you walk away from the item until you can't see the place where you dropped the item on your screen and walk back to the spot, the item will be there again. We are tryin to perfect a server where you have to get items by working for them and not just getting them very easy. Please help me
